Description:
Detects events with patterns found in commands used for reconnaissance on linux systems

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Linux Recon Indicators
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '% -name .htpasswd%' or command like '% -perm -4000 %')
